result.reason: Touchpad scrolling can inadvertently activate the hosting panel or main window, stealing focus from the embedded PuTTY process. Explicitly handling focus events on the container is needed to restore it.
result.approach: In PuttyBase.Connect, subscribe to InterfaceControl.GotFocus (and potentially MouseDown/MouseWheel) events to trigger this.Focus(), ensuring the external PuTTY window claims focus when the container is interacted with.
